summary.span: 顯示 控制項的內容。

span.span: Displays the content of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供用來設定樣式的各種元件的支援控制項。The class provides support for styling the various components of a control. 如需有關在捲軸的區域資訊，請參閱。For information about the scrolling region inside a , see . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用來設定樣式的內容控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use a to style the content of a control. span.span: The that becomes visible.

param.name: rectangle
param.span: 識別要顯示之座標空間的週框。

summary.span: 強迫捲動內容，直到看到 物件的座標空間為止。

span.span: Forces content to scroll until the coordinate space of a object is visible.
A that represents the visible region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在大部分情況下，傳回是輸入矩形的轉換的版本。In most cases, the returned is a transformed version of the input rectangle. 在某些情況下，例如當輸入的矩形不能完全符合檢視區中，傳回的值可能較小。In some cases, such as when the input rectangle cannot fit entirely within the viewport, the return value may be smaller.
